Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.encdec

Class Cookie

java.lang.Object
io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.encdec.Cookie
public class Cookie extends Object
Ersatz abstraction of a request or response cookie. See also the CookieMatcher.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Cookie()
    Creates an empty cookie.
